channel.title: üè¢ NVIDIA on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ NVIDIA on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: ChatQA: Surpassing GPT-4 on Conversational QA and RAG
item.description: ChatQA, a new suite of models, outperforms GPT-4 in conversational QA and RAG by using a two-stage instruction tuning method and a cost-effective dense retriever.

item.title: Compact Language Models via Pruning and Knowledge Distillation
item.description: MINITRON: Efficiently creating smaller, high-performing LLMs via pruning & distillation, slashing training costs by up to 40x!

item.title: Diffusion-Reward Adversarial Imitation Learning
item.description: Diffusion-Reward Adversarial Imitation Learning (DRAIL) enhances Generative Adversarial Imitation Learning by integrating diffusion models, resulting in more stable and smoother reward functions for s…

item.title: Guiding a Diffusion Model with a Bad Version of Itself
item.description: Boost image quality in diffusion models without reducing variation using Autoguidance: guide a high-quality model with a less-trained version of itself!

item.title: MaskLLM: Learnable Semi-Structured Sparsity for Large Language Models
item.description: MaskLLM learns efficient semi-structured sparsity in LLMs via end-to-end training, achieving significant speedup and memory reduction without sacrificing performance.

item.title: Memorize What Matters: Emergent Scene Decomposition from Multitraverse
item.description: 3D Gaussian Mapping (3DGM) achieves self-supervised camera-only 3D scene decomposition by leveraging multi-traverse driving data, memorizing permanent structures while filtering out transient objects.

item.title: QueST: Self-Supervised Skill Abstractions for Learning Continuous Control
item.description: QueST: A novel self-supervised skill abstraction architecture for continuous robot control, achieves state-of-the-art performance on multitask and few-shot learning benchmarks by learning flexible, tr…
